caption.p: Latitude–height geopotential height associated with stationary waves of ( a–d) wavenumber 1 and ( e–h) wavenumber 2 at 60°N, for ( a,e) weak, ( b,f) moderate, ( c,g) strong, and ( d,h) very strong IPWP Niño (NDJ mean), based on WACCM4 simulations (R1–5). Contours show the wave response (contour interval is 5 m; negative contours are dashed) and shading shows the climatological stationary waves.
